nodes.text: Evac 1 or Rescue 1 was a transport used by the Lok Revenants at the First Battle of Lok.

Evac 1 was present at Nym's Base when the Trade Federation attacked it. The ship was one of two ships chosen to evacuate all personnel. Unfortunately for the pirates, Evac 1 had a problem with an engine relay, keeping the freighter on the ground. The relay was eventually fixed by Reese and Evac 1 took off. It was hardly in the air when it was struck by bombs from droid bombers. The craft was consumed by explosions while the Revenants' leader, Nym, watched helplessly.
